Unheralded MIs important high likelihood miss opportunity prevention . The proportion MIs 'unheralded ' unknown . This study aim quantify proportion MIs occur 'unheralded ' also give estimate incidence 'unheralded ' MI UK , compare 'heralded ' MI angina recent onset ( MIs premonitory symptom ) .
DOC.brief_title: Myocardial Infarction First Manifestation Coronary Heart Disease : Rates Heralded Unheralded Myocardial Infarction
DOC.detailed_description: This study part CALIBER ( Cardiovascular disease research use link bespoke study electronic record ) programme fund 5 year NIHR Wellcome Trust . The central theme CALIBER research linkage Myocardial Ischaemia National Audit Project ( MINAP ) primary care ( GPRD ) resource . The overarch aim CALIBER good understand aetiology prognosis specific coronary phenotype across range causal domain , particularly electronic record provide contribution beyond traditional study . CALIBER receive Ethics approval ( ref 09/H0810/16 ) ECC approval ( ref ECC 2-06 ( b ) /2009 CALIBER dataset ) . Using data MINAP GPRD , patient experience first myocardial infarction ( MI ) separate three category : - 'Heralded MI ' : patient diagnose treated cardiovascular disease 90 day MI . - 'MI premonitory symptom ' : patient diagnose treated cardiovascular disease within 90 day prior MI . - 'Unheralded MI ' : patient without cardiovascular disease diagnosis treatment time MI . Patients MI identify link GPRD-MINAP record . Using GPRD population denominator , study establish absolute incidence rate first 'unheralded ' MI calendar year , age , sex , season , MI subtype ( ST-elevation MI non ST-elevation MI ) region compare rate first 'heralded ' MIs first 'MI premonitory symptom ' .
DOC.criteria: Patients GPRD practice deem `` standard '' GPRD criterion include practice agree link MINAP dataset . Age 18 . Patients exclude experience first MI . Patients exclude fulfil one inclusion criterion .
